thread.title: Recommend! One of my favorite stays in Europe.
thread.title_full: Recommend! One of my favorite stays in Europe. - Review of Hotel Aiglon - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Weston H
title: Recommend! One of my favorite stays in Europe.
text:
First of all- the room is beautiful and spacious. The bathroom is wonderful, large, and well lit. The staff were friendly. This location is great! From CDG, just take the train to Port Royal and then walk towards Raspail- about 7-8 minutes. The hotel is just across the street! This neighborhood is wonderful, 10 minutes walk to great shopping like Zara. Restaurants, bistros, and even Starbucks just minutes away. I will come here again!
Room Tip: Ask for a family room, wonderful and spacious. See more room tips
